Different Crime.Crime Name: Misrepresentation under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
credibility_assessment: Applicant lied about meeting employer in 2001
procedural_fairness: Judicial review analyzed whether Officer exceeded authority or breached fairness
misrepresentation_or_fraud: Applicant provided inconsistent information during interview about relationship with employer
decision_outcome: Application for judicial review dismissed; no breach of duty found
legal_basis: Under IRPA, visa officers can assess applicant credibility but rely on HRSDC for employment offer genuineness
